text: The 2019 UCI Para-cycling Track World Championships were the World Championships for track cycling with athletes with a physical disability. The Championships took place in Apeldoorn, Netherlands from 14 to 17 March 2019. ==The championships== Apeldoorn in the Netherlands hosted the UCI Para-Cycling Track World Championships for the second time. ==Track events== Events were held in five discipline; match sprint, team sprint, time trial, individual pursuit and scratch race, and across 6 disability classifications. Test events were held for: 1 km Tandem Mixed Team Sprint and Omnium (C1, C2, C3, C4 and C5 for Men and Women). Tests events do not count for the UCI Ranking and are not awarded a World Champion's title. {| |- | colspan=8 bgcolor=#d8d8d8 align=center| Men's events |- |rowspan=2| Sprint | Mixed team | Li Zhangyu
